label: 江家次第
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Gōke shidai  (J.) 江家次第, also referred to simply as 江次第 Gō shidai. This court ritual manual was written by 大江匡房 *e no Masafusa (1041-1111) at the request of the chancellor Fujiwara no Moromichi (1062-99), and completed in 1111.
